bibl.title: The New Papyrological Primer, being the Fifth Edition of David and Van Groningen's Papyrological Primer [1965].
bibl.seg: PESTMAN P.W., The New Papyrological Primer, being the Fifth Edition of David and Van Groningen's Papyrological Primer [1965].
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1990, 8°, xxii-317 pp., figg., cartes, tabl., pll. Hfl. 72.

C.R. par William M. Brashear, Enchoria 19-20 (1992-1993) pp. 235-236. - Paul Heilporn, ChrEg 68 (1993) Nos 135-136, pp. 289-290. - Joachim Hengstl, BibO 50 (1993) coll. 149-151. - Alain Martin, AntCl 61 (1992) pp. 542-543. - José O'Callaghan, OCP 57 (1991) pp. 460-461. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 39 (1993) p. 83. - Jean A. Straus, EtCl 62 (1994) p. 95. - K.A. Worp, Mnemosyne 4a s., 46 (1993) pp. 279-281. - Gabriella Messeri Savorelli, APapyrol 3 (1991) pp. 153-154.
